Mahadev Ghurhu is a town in the Siddharth Nagar district in Basti division within Indian state of Uttar Pradesh and adjacent to Nepal. Mahadev Ghurhu is situated 170 km from the State's Capital City Lucknow.
Overview.
The city Mahadev Ghurhu is situated at a distance of 4 kilometers from Itwa, 65 kilometers from the Basti and 120 kilometers from Gorakhpur.
This village founded by Baba Gainlal Srivastav.. The nearest railway station is Barhni which is 25 kilometers from Mahadev Ghurhu. It is on the Gonda-gorakhpur loop line and is being converted into broad gauge line. Another railway station near to Mahadev Ghurhu is Basti, which is well connected to Delhi, Mumbai, Lucknow, Gorakhpur etc.
